translation.en: Ready or not, here I come.
translation.ja: もういいかい？　さがすよ

translation.en: You'll stay with Aunt May and Uncle Ben for a little while.
translation.ja: メイおばさんの家にいなさい

translation.en: Doesn't like crust on his sandwiches...
translation.ja: この子 パンの耳(みみ)は嫌い

translation.en: ...and he likes to sleep with a little light on.
translation.ja: 寝るときは薄明かりを
おはよう　パーカー
ねえ　あなたピーターよね

translation.en: Listen, are you busy Friday night?
Cool. Can you take pictures of my boyfriend's car?
translation.ja: カレの車の写真撮ってくれない？

translation.en: You know, I really wanna frame a good one for his birthday.
translation.ja: 誕生日のプレゼントにしたいの

translation.en: That's really nice of you. Wow, that's such a nice thought.
translation.ja: それは素敵だね　名案だ

translation.en: Yeah, I'll have a look at the old.... -The old schedule. -Okay.
-Yes, sir? -You want to keep that skateboard?
translation.ja: 先生 校内は禁止だぞ

translation.en: Eat it! Eat it! Eat it!
Eat your vegetables, Gordon. Come on!
Hey, Parker, come on. Get a picture of this.
translation.ja: パーカー　写真を撮れ

translation.en: No, I'm not gonna take a picture of it. Put him down, man.
translation.ja: イヤだ　降ろしてやれよ

translation.en: Get up! Come on! Come on! Get up!
...we still on for after school today? My house, 3:30?
translation.ja: 今日も家に来る？放課後３時半

translation.en: I hope you did homework. Last time, I was... ...disappointed in you.
translation.ja: 私の宿題はした？こないだは本当にガッカリ

translation.en: -Okay, move. -No, how about we go to class?
translation.ja: どけ フラッシュ　授業に出るのよ
フラッシュ　授業に出るのよ いい？

translation.en: I thought that was great what you did.
It was stupid, but it was great.
translation.ja: バカだけど よかった

translation.en: You should go to the nurse. You might have a concussion.
I want to know if you know your name.
translation.ja: 自分の名前 分かる？

translation.en: I'd still go to the nurse though.
I'm making spaghetti and meatballs tonight.
translation.ja: 夕食はミートボール･スパゲティよ
マジ？　ミートボール？

translation.en: Since when don't you like spaghetti and meatballs, huh?
translation.ja: いつからミートボール嫌いになったの？
その顔 平気だ　スケボーで転んだ

translation.en: I'm all right. Just-- I fell, skating.
translation.ja: 平気だ　スケボーで転んだ

translation.en: Ben Parker, don't you even... ...think about leaving that filthy box in my kitchen.
translation.ja: ベン　そんな汚い箱をキッチンに置かないで

translation.en: Oh, well, then, by all means... ...leave that box in my kitchen.
translation.ja: だったら汚い箱も認めるわ

translation.en: Why you kids ride those things, I'll never know.
translation.ja: 転んだの　何であんな物で遊ぶのかしら

translation.en: Because it's stupid and dangerous. Remember when we were stupid? No.
translation.ja: くだらなくて危険だから我々だって…

translation.en: -Trust me, we were. -All right. Good to know.
translation.ja: 同じだった そっか

translation.en: -Where's the flood? -Follow me. I'll show you.
translation.ja: 洪水なの？ 見せてやる

translation.en: Too much water for the condenser tray or the heat exchange tubing. This has got to be the fill line.
translation.ja: 水がこぼれ過ぎてるパイプが漏れてるんだ

translation.en: That's the only thing that makes any sense.
No, not tonight. I'll go by the hardware store tomorrow.
translation.ja: 今夜はムリ　あす買ってくる

translation.en: Good deal. And meanwhile, put this on your face.
Come on. I know a right cross when I see one.
translation.ja: パンチの痕はすぐ分かる

translation.en: Yes or no? Do I have to call somebody's father?
Well, I wouldn't tell your Aunt May. I pity the poor kid who'd have to suffer her wrath.
translation.ja: メイには黙っておけ相手に雷が落ちる

translation.en: Before you come up, see if... -...there's anything else worth saving. -Okay.
translation.ja: 大事な物があったら取っておけ

translation.en: -Plumbers don't fix appliances. -Yes, they do. They fix pipes and pump things.
translation.ja: 配管工は 冷凍庫の修理などせんよ

translation.en: I forgot all about that thing. It was your dad's.
translation.ja: すっかり忘れてたお前の父さんのだ

translation.en: -Yeah. -He asked us to keep it safe.
translation.ja: 大切に保管を頼まれた

translation.en: He saw it in the window of that leather shop over on 9th Avenue.
translation.ja: 父さんが９番街の革の店で見つけた

translation.en: He was 19. What does a 19-year-old kid need with a briefcase?
translation.ja: 19歳のときだ19の若者がそんな鞄を

translation.en: And guess who sold it to him.
He asked you to keep this safe? There's nothing in here.
Have you looked? There's nothing here.
Your father was a very secretive man, Peter.
translation.ja: 秘密の多い人だったから

translation.en: Who's that? Do you know who that is?
Some guy who worked with your dad, I guess.
translation.ja: 父さんと働いてた男だろ

translation.en: Just take this off the table, all right?
translation.ja: テーブルから降ろして食事をするのよ

translation.en: We're gonna eat. Off. And wash your hands.
translation.ja: テーブルから降ろして食事をするのよ 手を洗ってきて

translation.en: I need you to be a good boy.
translation.ja: 〝オズコープ社〞 いい子でな

translation.en: There's something your mom and I have to do.
translation.ja: ママと私は することがある

translation.en: Oh, my God. You look just like him.
translation.ja: 驚いたな　父さんそっくりだ

translation.en: ...I don't have much education. You know that, Peter.
translation.ja: 大した教育は受けてない

translation.en: Hell, I stopped being able to help with your homework when you were 10.
translation.ja: お前が10歳で 宿題の手伝いもやめた

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is...
...I know it's been rough for you without your dad.
translation.ja: 父さんがいなくて辛かったろ

translation.en: And I know we don't talk much about them.
translation.ja: 両親の話もしなかった

translation.en: -Yeah, it's all right. -No, it is not all right.
translation.ja: いいさ いや　よくない

translation.en: I wish I could change it, but I can't.
translation.ja: わしは何も変えられんがね

translation.en: That's the name of the guy in the picture with your dad.
translation.ja: 父さんと写真に写ってた男だ

translation.en: They worked together for years and they were close.
But after that night, we never saw him again.
translation.ja: だが あの夜以来顔も出さん

translation.en: He never even called. Not once.
I don't know. I'm here to see Dr. Connors.
translation.ja: 実は コナーズ博士の…

translation.en: Right. You'll find yourself to the left.
You are here for the internship?
Okay. You'll find your badge to the left.
translation.ja: いいわ　自分の名札を見つけて

translation.en: -Having trouble finding yourself? -No. Yeah, I got it.

translation.ja: いいわ　ゲバラさん
オズコープ社にようこそ

translation.en: Born from the mind of our founder, Norman Osborn...
translation.ja: 創設者はノーマン･オズボーン

translation.en: ...the Oscorp Tower houses 108 floors of innovation.
translation.ja: 108階建てのタワーは新技術の宝庫です

translation.en: Our scientific minds are pushing the boundaries of defense, biomedical...
translation.ja: 当社の科学者たちは 防衛― バイオ医療　化学技術を推進“未来は我らの手で”

translation.en: ...and chemical technologies. The future lies within.
translation.ja: バイオ医療　化学技術を推進“未来は我らの手で”
ようこそ　私はグウェン

translation.en: I'm Gwen Stacy, a senior at Midtown Science...
translation.ja: ようこそ　私はグウェン ミッドタウン高校の３年生でここの主任研修生
ミッドタウン高校の３年生でここの主任研修生

translation.en: I'll be with you for the duration of your visit.
translation.ja: ミッドタウン高校の３年生でここの主任研修生 皆さんを案内します

translation.en: Where I go, you go. That's the rule. Remember that...
-...all will be fine. -Come on! -If you forget that-- -Listen!
translation.ja: いいこと？　もし忘れたら…

translation.en: Look, listen. Tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here.
Just tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here! My name's Rodrigo!
translation.ja: 僕はゲバラだ　ゲバラだって！

translation.en: I guess I don't need to tell you what happens if you forget.
translation.ja: 忘れたら ああなるってこと
グウェン コナーズ博士

translation.en: Welcome. My name is Dr. Curtis Connors.
translation.ja: ようこそ私はコナーズ博士

translation.en: Yes, in case you're wondering, I'm a southpaw.
translation.ja: ごらんの通り左利きだ

translation.en: I'm not a cripple, I'm a scientist... ...and the world's foremost authority on herpetology.
translation.ja: 右手はないが世界トップの爬虫類学の権威…

translation.en: That's reptiles, for those of you who don't know.
translation.ja: つまりトカゲの研究家だよ

translation.en: Like the Parkinson's patient who watches on in horror... ...as her body slowly betrays her...
translation.ja: 徐々に体が利かなくなるパーキンソン病の女性や―
日々 視力が低下する黄斑変性症の男性のように―

translation.en: ...whose eyes grow dimmer each day, I long to fix myself.
translation.ja: 日々 視力が低下する黄斑変性症の男性のように― 私も自分を治したい弱者のいない世界を作りたい

translation.en: I want to create a world without weakness.
translation.ja: 私も自分を治したい弱者のいない世界を作りたい

translation.en: Anyone care to venture a guess just how?
Promising. But the solution... ...I'm thinking of is more radical.
translation.ja: 悪くない　だがもっと革新的な方法だ
誰か？ 異種間遺伝子交配
パーキンソン病の要因は―

translation.en: ...when the brain cells that produce dopamine...
translation.ja: パーキンソン病の要因は― ドーパミンを作る脳細胞の減少です
ドーパミンを作る脳細胞の減少です

translation.en: But a zebra fish has the ability... ...to regenerate cells on command.
translation.ja: ゼブラフィッシュは自在に細胞を再生できる

translation.en: If you could give this ability... ...to the woman you're talking about, that's that. She's....
translation.ja: その力を その女性に与えられれば―

translation.en: Yeah, you just have to look past the gills on her neck.
He's one of Midtown Science's... -...best and brightest. -Really?
I'm afraid duty calls. I'll leave you in the more-than-capable hands of Miss Stacy.
translation.ja: 仕事に戻る　あとは有能なステイシー君に委ねよう

translation.en: If you'd like to gather round.
Welcome to Oscorp's tree of life.
translation.ja: オズコープ社へようこそ

translation.en: Our planet's tree of life is immense.
translation.ja: 地球の生命の樹は巨大です

translation.en: I was gonna say I work here... ...but it seems like you do work here. So you know that I don't.
translation.ja: そう言いたいけどここで働いてるのは君だ

translation.en: -You following me? -No, I'm not following you, no.
translation.ja: ストーカー？ 違うよまさか君がいたなんて

translation.en: -I had no idea you worked here. -Why would you be here?
translation.ja: 違うよまさか君がいたなんて じゃ なぜ？

translation.en: I just snuck in because.... I love science.
translation.ja: 忍び込んだ科学が好きだから

translation.en: So you snuck in--? -I have to lead this tour group. -I know.
translation.ja: それで忍び込んだ？私は案内がある

translation.en: I'll ask you more about this later. Do not get me in trouble.
translation.ja: 質問はあとでするから面倒はよして

translation.en: -I promise you I won't. -Stay with the group.
All right, guys? I'm gonna take you to the bioreactor room now.
translation.ja: バイオリアクター室へ

translation.en: We received the results from the mRNA sequences this morning.
translation.ja: 今朝 ｍＲＮＡテストの結果が届いたが―

translation.en: Another dead end. It's the decay rate algorithm.
translation.ja: やり直しだ　崩壊率の数式が…
予想通りだ あと一歩だと言ったろ
あと一歩だと言ったろ

translation.en: We are close, but it's gonna take time.
translation.ja: そうだが 時間が掛かる

translation.en: He doesn't have time. Norman Osborn is dying, Dr. Connors.
translation.ja: ノーマン･オズボーンは死にかかってる

translation.en: Or we'll both lose our heads.
All right, give me the badge.
Disgusting. Now I smell like beer.
translation.ja: イヤだ　ビール臭い

translation.en: I didn't mean to do that.
No, man, no. Not my board. Please, dude, don't--
translation.ja: よせ　大事なボードだ
次はコニーアイランド

translation.en: Next and final stop, Coney Island.

translation.ja: ごめん　遅くなった
ごめん　遅くなった 心配してたのよ

translation.en: I'm so sorry... ...I kept you guys up.
translation.ja: 寝ないで待ってたなんて…
僕は身勝手で無責任だ

translation.en: This beats all other meat loafs.
translation.ja: おばさんの メチャうま

translation.en: Yeah. Nobody likes your meat loaf.
translation.ja: ああ　あんなマズいのに

translation.en: He took the frozen macaroni and cheese.
translation.ja: 冷凍のマカロニ＆チーズまで

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me you didn't like my meat loaf?
translation.ja: そんなにマズかったの？

translation.en: You could have said that to me 37 years ago. How many meat loafs have I made for you?
translation.ja: 37年前に言ってよずっと作ってたのに

translation.en: -You don't remember me. I-- -The intern from the other day.
translation.ja: 実は僕は… 先日の研修生

translation.en: I'm sure you're very nice, but this is a home.
translation.ja: すまんが ここは自宅だ

translation.en: I ask you to make an appointment with my office.
I'm afraid I can't help you much. I don't know why they left or where they were going.
translation.ja: なぜ彼らが消えたのか行き先も分からない
どうも あなたの本
本当に可能だと？遺伝子交配
本当に可能だと？遺伝子交配 もちろんだ

translation.en: Your father and I were mocked for our theories. Not just in the community at large, but at Oscorp, as well.
translation.ja: お陰で 私と君の父さんは仲間に笑われてた
お陰で 私と君の父さんは仲間に笑われてた “マッド･サイエンティスト”だと

translation.en: And then your father bred the spiders... ...and everything changed.
translation.ja: だが君の父さんの生みだしたクモがすべてを変えた

translation.en: The results were beyond encouraging. They were spectacular.
translation.ja: 期待を上回るすごい結果だった

translation.en: We were gonna change the lives of millions.
translation.ja: 大勢の人生を変えられるはずだった

translation.en: And I knew without him, I....
translation.ja: 彼がいなければ 私は…

translation.en: So I stayed away from you... ...and your family.
translation.ja: それで君たち家族から遠ざかった

translation.en: And for that, I'm truly sorry.
Say it worked. Say you got it to work.
translation.ja: 遺伝子交配が可能になったら

translation.en: Like, how much would the foreign species take over?
translation.ja: どれだけ その遺伝子は被験体を支配します？

translation.en: What could the side effects be?
It's hard to say, considering no subject survived.
translation.ja: まだ生き延びた被験体はない

translation.en: How did you come up with this?
Peter, how about coming to see me at the Tower... -...one day after school? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 放課後にタワーに来てくれるかね

translation.en: You did that on purpose, Flash!
I should've. You better watch your back.
translation.ja: わざと？　口に気をつけろ

translation.en: -Come on, man. -Why don't you take it from me?
-Take it from him! -Come on, Flash. Take it.
All right, bring it! Come on, Parker! Come on!
translation.ja: 来やがれ　パーカー

translation.en: -Peter's behavior is just unacceptable. -They won't make us pay...
-...for the backboard. -I don't care about the backboard.
translation.ja: 弁償など構わん　本当か？
弁償など構わん　本当か？ 何が？

translation.en: What I heard in there just now. Did you humiliate that boy?
translation.ja: 今の話だ　その生徒に恥をかかせたのか？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Is he the kid that hit you?
translation.ja: 向こう？ 殴った男か？

translation.en: So all this is about getting even.
If so, I guess you must feel pretty good about yourself now, right?
translation.ja: だったら気分がスッキリしたろ

translation.en: Well, thanks to this little escapade of yours... ...I had to change shifts at work...
translation.ja: お前の悪ふざけのお陰で今日は夜勤に替えた

translation.en: ...so you have to pick up Aunt May tonight at 9 o'clock. Understood?
translation.ja: お前が９時にメイを迎えに行け

translation.en: -Yeah. -He's got you on his computer. I'm his probation officer.
translation.ja: こいつのパソコンで見た私は保護観察官だ

translation.en: He's a character. That's my uncle.
translation.ja: ヘンだろ　僕のおじだ

translation.en: He's a pathological liar. He thought you were someone else.
translation.ja: ウソが好きで誰かと勘違いした

translation.en: Oh, man, you don't have me on your computer?
I took a photo of the debate team, and you're in the debate team.
translation.ja: 僕の撮った弁論部の写真に君が

translation.en: -Right. -So... ...he must have seen-- I was touching up stuff.
translation.ja: それを見たんだあれをいじってたら

translation.en: I was.... I'm not gonna answer that.

translation.ja: あなた 退学？ 退学じゃない　地域奉仕だ

translation.en: I didn't get expelled. I got community service.
translation.ja: 退学じゃない　地域奉仕だ

translation.en: So you want to-- I don't know...?
We could do something else, or we could-- -If you don't feel like, we could-- -Yeah.
translation.ja: 何かがイヤなら違うことでも

translation.en: Okay. All right, good. Sounds good.
-I can't right now, I can't right now. -Yeah, no.
-I'm so busy right now. -I know, me too.
We have protein structure, rDNA... ...chromatography, transgenics testing...
translation.ja: Ｒ－ＤＮＡ　染色体交配ラボＸ線ビデオ

translation.en: ...that's X-ray video. That's the only one on the planet. We have....
translation.ja: Ｒ－ＤＮＡ　染色体交配ラボＸ線ビデオ 世界で唯一だそれに細胞株実験ラボ
世界で唯一だそれに細胞株実験ラボ あの装置

translation.en: Yeah, I remember a picture of that in my dad's office.
translation.ja: 父さんの書斎に写真が

translation.en: The idea was so simple. You load it with an antigen.
translation.ja: アイデアは単純だ 抗原性薬剤を詰め 上空で雲にして街中に降らせる

translation.en: It creates a cloud which can be dispersed over a neighborhood, even a city.
translation.ja: 抗原性薬剤を詰め 上空で雲にして街中に降らせる

translation.en: Theoretically, you could cure polio in an afternoon.
translation.ja: 理論的には それでポリオを絶滅できる
すごい 反対意見もある

translation.en: Well, others disagreed. What if the device were loaded with a toxin?
translation.ja: 反対意見もある もし毒が詰められたら逃げたくても―

translation.en: What if you wanted to opt out?
translation.ja: もし毒が詰められたら逃げたくても―

translation.en: You can't run away from a cloud after all, so here it lies, gathering dust.
translation.ja: 雲から逃げられないだから埃(ほこり)をかぶってる

translation.en: What you see here is a computer model of a lizard.
Many of these wonderful creatures have so brilliantly adapted...
translation.ja: これらの生物はすごい適応力で―

translation.en: ...that they can regenerate entire limbs at will.
translation.ja: 自在に手足を再生できる

translation.en: We're trying to harness this capability... ...and transfer it into our host subject:
translation.ja: この能力を抽出し被験体に移入する

translation.en: See what I'm trying to do?
-Come on, come on, come on. -Pending. Failed.
translation.ja: 被験体死亡 検証中　失敗
ペプチド結合　数式承認
再生完了 生命反応よし血圧正常
生命反応よし血圧正常

translation.en: Meet Fred and Wilma, our three-legged mice.
translation.ja: フレディ君を紹介しよう

translation.en: Okay. Careful, don't want to stick you by mistake. Human trials aren't until next week.
translation.ja: 君に射(う)ちたくない人体実験はまだ早い

translation.en: Now, don't answer that, but I'm glad to know it's working.
translation.ja: 出なくていい携帯は通じてた

translation.en: You owe your aunt an apology bigtime.
translation.ja: お前はメイにひどいことをした

translation.en: Be a man. Get in there and apologize.

translation.ja: ごめんなさい　おばさん

translation.en: Honestly, you don't have to apologize to me. It's your--
translation.ja: ごめんなさい　おばさん 謝らなくていいのよ

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, I got distracted.
translation.ja: オズコープ社でいろいろと

translation.en: Your aunt, my wife, had to walk 12 blocks alone...
translation.ja: 私の妻は 真夜中に１人で12ブロックも歩かされた

translation.en: ...in the middle of the night and then wait in a deserted subway station...
translation.ja: 私の妻は 真夜中に１人で12ブロックも歩かされた その上 人気(ひとけ)のない駅で電車を待った
その上 人気(ひとけ)のない駅で電車を待った ベン　私は１人で歩いて帰ってこられるわ

translation.en: ...I am completely capable of walking home--
translation.ja: ベン　私は１人で歩いて帰ってこられるわ

translation.en: You will not defend this boy!
You're a lot like your father. You really are, Peter, and that's a good thing...
translation.ja: お前は父親に似てる本当にな　いいことだ

translation.en: ...but your father lived by a philosophy, a principle, really.
translation.ja: だが父さんには信念があった

translation.en: He believed that if you could do good things for other people...
translation.ja: 彼は 人のために何かできるなら―

translation.en: ...you had a moral obligation to do those things. That's what's at stake here.
translation.ja: それをする責任があると信じてた
それが人としての責任だ
すごいね　立派だよ

translation.en: That's all well and good. So where is he?
translation.ja: なら 父さんはどこ？
父さんは どこにいる？

translation.en: He didn't think it was his responsibility to be here to tell me himself?
translation.ja: 自分で それを伝える責任を放棄した

translation.en: Oh, come on, how dare you?
How dare I? How dare you?
Where you going? Peter, come back here, please.
translation.ja: どこへ行く？ピーター　戻って来い

translation.en: Ben, leave him alone for a little while. He'll be all right.
translation.ja: 構わないで　大丈夫よ

translation.en: Yeah, you're holding up the line. No.
You can leave a penny, you can't take a penny.
-What? -You can leave... ...a penny anytime, you have to spend 10 dollars...
translation.ja: そっちに金があろうとなかろうと―

translation.en: ...to take a penny. It's store policy.
translation.ja: そっちに金があろうとなかろうと― 店には関係ない

translation.en: -You're holding up my line. -I don't have 2 cents.
translation.ja: レジのジャマだ 頼む

translation.en: You can't afford milk, step aside.
translation.ja: 金がないなら どけ

translation.en: Daddy didn't give you enough milk money today?
Someone call an ambulance! Uncle Ben, Uncle Ben.
translation.ja: 誰か救急車を！ ベンおじさん

translation.en: Witnesses gave a description to the sketch artist. I need you to take a look.
translation.ja: 目撃証言からの犯人の似顔絵です 心当たりは？

translation.en: I didn't expect you would, ma'am. Homicide detectives are on it.
translation.ja: でしょうな 殺人課が担当しますあとは彼らが

translation.en: We'll see what they turn up.
translation.ja: 殺人課が担当しますあとは彼らが

translation.en: There's one other thing. He has a star...
translation.ja: もうひとつ 左手首に星のタトゥーが
左手首に星のタトゥーが

translation.en: Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
translation.ja: ピーター　最近お前が大変なのは知ってる

translation.en: ...and I'm sorry about that. I think I know what you're feeling.
translation.ja: 辛いだろうお前の気持ちは分かる

translation.en: -Not today. -Come on, I just want to talk.
translation.ja: 今日はよせ 話したいだけだ

translation.en: Look, your uncle died. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: おじさんが死んだ気の毒に

translation.en: You like beating on girls? You like beating on old men?
translation.ja: 女を殴るのか年寄りもだろ
消えな　お前の場所じゃない

translation.en: -You're in the wrong place. -When were you in Queens?
translation.ja: 消えな　お前の場所じゃない いつから この街に？
ニッキー！ 銃はよせ　僕も殺す気か？
銃はよせ　僕も殺す気か？
こいつ クレージーよ

translation.en: He has a star tattooed on his left hand.
translation.ja: 左手首に星のタトゥーが

translation.en: I know what you look like! You hear me?

translation.ja: 遺伝子強化クモの糸“バイオケーブル”は―

translation.en: We're just beginning to understand all the potential industrial applications.
translation.ja: あらゆる分野への応用が可能です

translation.en: A single pellet can safely store several hundred meters... ...of the lightweight cable.
translation.ja: 数百メートルの糸も小粒大で収まります

translation.en: Attention, all units in the confines of Precinct 13, receiving a 10-30...
translation.ja: 13分署内の全車に告ぐ 西19丁目角で事件発生

translation.en: Assailant is Caucasian male, mid-30s... ...170 to 180 pounds...
translation.ja: 犯人は白人男性　30歳代体重80キロぐらい

translation.en: ...shoulder-length blond hair. Last seen on foot heading eastbound on 19th Street.
translation.ja: 肩までの金髪19丁目を東に向かってる

translation.en: Well, no, he wears a mask.
Most of his victims... ...are suspects with serious rap sheets. They're calling him a vigilante.
translation.ja: 被害者は 主に犯罪者です我々の味方ではと

translation.en: Okay, he's not a vigilante, he's an anarchist.
translation.ja: 違う　アナーキストだ
助けてくれ 逮捕しろ　降ろして
逮捕しろ　降ろして
競技用　スパンデックス

translation.en: Extraordinary velocity vector is a function... ...of both mass and acceleration.
translation.ja: 速度ベクトルは質量と加速の作用による

translation.en: Come on, you know better than anyone... ...the weight on any pendulum has no effect on speed.
translation.ja: 振り子の重りは 振り子の速度に影響を与えない

translation.en: It doesn't affect frequency, but it's totally a factor in momentum.
translation.ja: 振動数には与えないが運動量に与える
タマゴ？　買って帰る

translation.en: In the future, if you're gonna steal cars... ...don't dress like a car thief, man.
translation.ja: 今度 車を盗むときは泥棒の格好はよせ

translation.en: What are you? You a cop?
Really? You seriously think I'm a cop? Cop in a skin-tight red-and-blue suit?
translation.ja: 警官に見える？ 赤青タイツの警官なんて…
赤青タイツの警官なんて…

translation.en: You've got a mind... ...of the true scholar, sir.
translation.ja: 本当におめでたい奴だな

translation.en: I was going more for the guys who do the luge.
translation.ja: むしろソリの選手だろ

translation.en: Good thinking. Get out the window.
translation.ja: そうだよ　窓から逃げろ

translation.en: There you go. You got it.
-Just let me go. -Is that a real knife?
translation.ja: どけ それ本物のナイフ？

translation.en: -My weakness, it's small knives. -Just let me go.
translation.ja: 頼む　ナイフはよせ どけ

translation.en: Anything but knives! Oh, it's so simple.
translation.ja: ナイフはダメ 単純だな
僕が作ったクモの糸だ

translation.en: -I don't think you want to know. -Let me go!
translation.ja: 僕が作ったクモの糸だ 放してくれ

translation.en: Come on, let me go. Stop it!
translation.ja: 頼む　放せ よせ

translation.en: This could've gone a lot worse.
Boys in blue here. -Yo, I got him. -Freeze!
translation.ja: やっと到着だ　捕まえたよ
タイツの男　動くな

translation.en: No one grasps the concept of the mask.
translation.ja: この格好 分からない？

translation.en: I just did 80 percent of your job. And that? That's how you repay me?
translation.ja: 警察に協力したのにこれが そのお返し？

translation.en: Hey, watch out. I'm swinging here. I'm swinging here.
translation.ja: 気をつけて　ブランコだ
レオタードの男１人に振り回された

translation.en: You don't have to wait up for me.

translation.ja: だめよ　どこにいたの？

translation.en: Nope. Forgot the eggs. I'm gonna get them now.
translation.ja: 忘れた　買ってくる

translation.en: No, you most certainly will not. Not at this hour.
translation.ja: 今ごろ行かないでこんな時間に

translation.en: Take off the damn hood and look at me.
translation.ja: フードを取って 私を見て

translation.en: Peter. Where do you go? Who does this to you?
translation.ja: ピーター　どこにいたの誰にそんな？

translation.en: Please go to sleep, Aunt May.

translation.ja: 教えて お願いだから もう寝てよ
お願いだから もう寝てよ

translation.en: I can't sleep. Don't you understand? I can't sleep.
translation.ja: 寝られないわ 分からないの　眠れない
ピーター 聞きなさい　秘密は代償を伴うものよ

translation.en: Secrets have a cost. They're not for free.
translation.ja: 聞きなさい　秘密は代償を伴うものよ
遺伝子交配が成功した

translation.en: I've used the lizard DNA to help Freddy regrow that limb.
translation.ja: トカゲのＤＮＡでこの脚が再生した
トカゲのＤＮＡでこの脚が再生した 奇跡だ

translation.en: No, it's hard work and promise.
translation.ja: 努力だよ　霊長類の応用に一歩近づいた

translation.en: -It's a step closer to the primate lab. -He doesn't have time for every little step.
translation.ja: 努力だよ　霊長類の応用に一歩近づいた のんびりしてられない
のんびり？ 彼は待てない

translation.en: Well, he'll have to. Unless he wants to be a lab rat.
translation.ja: 仕方ない　彼が実験台になるなら別だが

translation.en: You have to start human trials.
translation.ja: 人体実験を始めろ　すぐに

translation.en: -Now. -No, I don't, and no, I won't.
translation.ja: 人体実験を始めろ　すぐに それはできない

translation.en: -Well, then he's going to die. -People die.
translation.ja: あの人が死ぬぞ 人は死ぬ

translation.en: Human trials? Where are you going to find the people to volunteer?
translation.ja: 人体実験？　誰がそんな実験に志願する

translation.en: As far as anyone's concerned, it's for a flu shot.
translation.ja: 流感の注射だと思わせればいい

translation.en: I might think the Veterans Hospital is a place to start.
translation.ja: 退役軍人病院を使おう

translation.en: It's a little late for shock and indignation. About 15 years late.
translation.ja: 君が怒るには15年遅すぎた

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
Richard Parker wore it well. On you, it's a cheap suit, as it was then.
translation.ja: パーカーは頑(かたく)なだったが君のモラルは低かった

translation.en: I had nothing to do with that.
Is that what you told his son?
I don't know what you're saying.
You don't know, or you don't wanna know?
translation.ja: 忘れたか　忘れたいのか？

translation.en: Richard Parker said just about the same thing then that you are saying now.
translation.ja: あのときパーカーは今の君と同じ事を言った

translation.en: The clock is ticking, Dr. Connors.
The formula is ours now anyway.
translation.ja: この製法は我々がいただく

translation.en: Say goodbye to that arm you have dreamed of.
Have your office cleared out by the morning.
translation.ja: 朝までにオフィスを片づけろ

translation.en: Your toys can be taken away too, you know.
translation.ja: オモチャもすべて取り上げる
月曜だからＢクラス 木曜日よ

translation.en: -What? -Your eye, it looks bruised. Oh, yeah, no, I don't....
Maybe I got a rash or....
It's bad. Have you gone to the nurse?
No, no. I know. I know.
...you can come to this address at 8:00 tonight.
translation.ja: うちの住所　今夜８時に

translation.en: It's apartment 2016. I didn't write that part down. I don't know why I....
translation.ja: 部屋は2016号室書くのを忘れてた

translation.en: How did you get out there?
translation.ja: どうやって ここへ？

translation.en: -This is your room. -Yes, this is my room.
translation.ja: 君の部屋か そうよ
君のママに これを

translation.en: No, it's impressive. They actually held together very well.
translation.ja: すてきだわまだ もってる

translation.en: You have your suit in there?
It's for dinner. Are you gonna--? Are you gonna wear that?
translation.ja: ディナーよ　その格好で？

translation.en: -You must be Peter. -Dad, this is Peter.
translation.ja: ピーターだね パパ　ピーターよ

translation.en: Nice to meet you. Dinner's ready.

translation.ja: 彼は？ ブルックリンの退役軍人病院に出かけました

translation.en: The car is taking him to the Veterans Hospital in Brooklyn.
translation.ja: ブルックリンの退役軍人病院に出かけました

translation.en: No. He can't, Emma. You have to stop him. He--
translation.ja: それはマズいすぐに止めてくれ

translation.en: I would, but I always lose him on the bridge.
translation.ja: 橋だと携帯が繋がりません

translation.en: I'll make sure Dr. Ratha returns your call as soon as possible.
translation.ja: 何とか連絡を取ってみます

translation.en: I'm going to Holton Avenue, across the river. I'm in a hurry.
translation.ja: 川を渡ってホルトン街へ急いでる

translation.en: You want me to take the tunnel or the bridge?
Hey, you all right back there?
You're having trouble there? The head goes on the other--
translation.ja: ナイフは頭の方からよ

translation.en: Help Gwen's friend with his fish.
translation.ja: サイモン　手伝ってあげて

translation.en: -Tell us about your day. -Did you catch that spider guy yet?
translation.ja: あなた 今日は？ パパ　スパイダー男は？

translation.en: No, we didn't catch him yet.
But we will. He's an amateur...
translation.ja: すぐに捕まえる 真夜中に市民を襲ってる素人だがね

translation.en: ...who's assaulting civilians in the dead of night.
translation.ja: 真夜中に市民を襲ってる素人だがね

translation.en: He's clumsy, he leaves clues... ...but he's still dangerous.
translation.ja: ドジで 証拠も残してるが危険だ

translation.en: I'm not sure. I mean, I saw that video...
translation.ja: 違います　映像を見ました

translation.en: ...with him and the car thief, and....
I think most people would say that he was... ...providing a public service.
translation.ja: 誰が見ても あれは警察に協力してる

translation.en: If I wanted the car thief off the street, he'd already be off the street.
translation.ja: 我々は いつでもあの泥棒を逮捕できた

translation.en: Let me illuminate you. The car thief was leading us to the people who run the operation.
translation.ja: あの男から 裏の組織を割り出そうとしてた

translation.en: It's a six-month-long sting. It's called strategy. I'm sure you're aware of the term?
translation.ja: 半年間のおとり捜査つまり“戦略”だ

translation.en: You've heard about that in school?
-He didn't know you had a plan. -You seem to know...
translation.ja: 彼はそれを知らなかった 彼のことに詳しそうだな君はどっちの味方だ

translation.en: ...a lot about this. Know something we don't?
translation.ja: 彼のことに詳しそうだな君はどっちの味方だ

translation.en: -Whose side are you on? -I'm not on anyone's side.
translation.ja: 彼のことに詳しそうだな君はどっちの味方だ ネットで動画を見たんです

translation.en: -I saw a video on the Internet-- -You saw the video on the Internet.
translation.ja: ネットで動画を見たんです ネットの動画で事件解決か

translation.en: -Well, then the case is closed. -Well, no.
translation.ja: ネットの動画で事件解決か

translation.en: If you watch the video-- Maybe send you a link?
translation.ja: でも映像を見たらきっと…

translation.en: It looks like he's trying to help.
On the Internet he's being made out to look like a hero.
translation.ja: ネットなら誰でもヒーローになれる

translation.en: No, no. I'm not saying he's a hero.
translation.ja: 別にヒーローだなんて

translation.en: -What are you trying to say? -He's trying to help.
translation.ja: 何が言いたい？ 警察にできないことに協力を

translation.en: He's trying to do something the police can't.
translation.ja: 警察にできないことに協力を

translation.en: -I don't know. -What do you think we do? Sit around eating doughnuts... -...with our thumbs planted up our asses? -George.
translation.ja: 警察は ただドーナツ食って鼻クソほじってると？

translation.en: He stands for what you stand for. Protecting innocent people from bad guys.
translation.ja: 彼は味方です人々を悪党から守る

translation.en: I stand for law and order. That's what I stand for. Okay? I wear a badge.
translation.ja: 私は法の番人だバッジをつけてる

translation.en: This guy wears a mask like an outlaw.
translation.ja: あいつはマスクをかぶった無法者だ

translation.en: He's hunting down criminals that all look the same...
translation.ja: いつも同じ風貌の男を狙って

translation.en: ...like he's got some sort of personal vendetta.
But he's not protecting innocent people, Mr. Parker.
translation.ja: 罪なき人々を守ってはいない

translation.en: -Dad, we need to talk. -Yes, we do.
translation.ja: パパ あとで いいさ

translation.en: Thank you for having me. I'm sorry if I insulted you. It was not my intention.
translation.ja: 不快に思われたならお詫びをします

translation.en: -You're welcome. -Branzino was real good, Mrs. Stacy.
translation.ja: 構わんよ “ブランジーノ”おいしかったです
“ブランジーノ”おいしかったです

translation.en: I'm sorry. I thought he was going to arrest me at one point.
translation.ja: 僕も逮捕されるかと思った

translation.en: No, I wouldn't have let him arrest you.
-What happened to your face? -I wanna tell you something.
translation.ja: その顔は？ 話がある

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. I gotta tell you this one thing. I gotta tell you this one thing about the vigilante and the car thief.
translation.ja: その前に 例のマスクの男と車泥棒の話

translation.en: -No, no, no. -I don't want to talk about that.
Forget that. I won't talk about that.
translation.ja: 分かった　忘れて僕のことを話す

translation.en: -I'm gonna talk about me, okay? -What about you?
translation.ja: 分かった　忘れて僕のことを話す 何なの？

translation.en: It's impo-- I wish I could just--
translation.ja: ムリだ 言えるなら…

translation.en: I can't. It's hard to say.
Your father wants you to come inside.
Will you please find out what is going on, Alfred?
Somebody help! Help me! My kid is trapped!
translation.ja: 助けてくれ　息子が車にいる

translation.en: Just a normal guy, all right?
Okay, look. I'll undo the belt. You hold on to that seat in front of you. On three?
translation.ja: ベルトをはずすから前のシートにつかまって

translation.en: See how easy that was? You did a great job.
translation.ja: 簡単だろ　よくやった

translation.en: Put it on, the mask. It's gonna make you strong.
translation.ja: マスクをかぶれ　強くなる

translation.en: There you go. That's it. That's it, buddy.
translation.ja: いいぞ　そうだ いい子だ　登れ

translation.en: Do me a favor. A little faster, okay, bud?
You're doing great, buddy. You're doing great.
That's it. Keep coming. Keep it coming.

translation.ja: 昨夜― ウィリアムズバーグ橋で事件がありました

translation.en: ...9 p.m. last night, an incident took place on the Williamsburg Bridge.
translation.ja: ウィリアムズバーグ橋で事件がありました

translation.en: Much of what occurred is speculation at this point.
translation.ja: 真相はまだ推察の域を出ませんが―

translation.en: However, several eyewitnesses to the crime...
translation.ja: 真相はまだ推察の域を出ませんが― 目撃者の証言および警察の調べにより―

translation.en: ...as well as our own preliminary findings...
translation.ja: 目撃者の証言および警察の調べにより―

translation.en: ...have positively placed one individual at the scene.
translation.ja: 容疑者を割り出しました

translation.en: Which is why, this morning... ...I am issuing a warrant...
translation.ja: そして今朝 マスクの男―

translation.en: ...for the masked vigilante known as Spider-Man.
translation.ja: “スパイダーマン”の逮捕状を出しました

translation.en: You don't believe what the police are saying, do you?
translation.ja: 警察の話は信じないよね

translation.en: Does it scare you? What you can do?
What did that thing on the bridge look like?
It was real big. Too big to be human.
translation.ja: 人間にしてはデカすぎた

translation.en: Whatever was attacking them would have killed them.
translation.ja: 襲ってきた化け物に殺されかけた

translation.en: So I gotta go after it.
Well, you know, it was-- It was good for me too.
translation.ja: そうね　あなたもよ

translation.en: I gave everyone the week off.
No, I got a free track. I wanted to ask you a question.
translation.ja: 自由時間です　博士に質問が

translation.en: How would a predator track a reptile?
translation.ja: 爬虫類を捕食する方法は？

translation.en: Oh, they don't. Most reptiles are at the top of their respective food chain.
translation.ja: ない　爬虫類は食物連鎖のトップにいる

translation.en: Why the sudden interest in the cold-blooded?
translation.ja: なぜ突然 冷血動物に興味を？
聞いただけです 学校で生物のレポートを出すので
学校で生物のレポートを出すので

translation.en: So because of the cold blood... ...would they react to changes in temperatures?
translation.ja: 冷血動物は 突然の温度変化に影響を？

translation.en: You'd have to catch one first.
Did you know there's a rumor of a new species in New York?
translation.ja: ニューヨークに新種が現れたらしい

translation.en: What do you know about it? You seen it?
But it can be aggressive... ...if threatened.
translation.ja: だが脅かされると攻撃的になる

translation.en: Never been better, Peter. Never been better.
Now, if you'll excuse me. Afraid I have to ask you to leave.
translation.ja: すまないがもう帰ってもらおう

translation.en: I have a new project I'm working on. I need to be alone.
Don't worry, Mr. Parker. I'll be back.
translation.ja: 心配ない　戻ってくるよ

translation.en: Mr. Mayor, if there was a giant dinosaur running around... ...you would be the first to know.
translation.ja: 市長　街に恐竜が出現したらすぐに報告します

translation.en: So tell your son he can rest easy, all right?
translation.ja: 息子さんには心配ないと

translation.en: Yeah. You and me both, sir.
translation.ja: ええ　ぜひご一緒に

translation.en: -Mr. Parker, why are you not in school? -Got a free track.
translation.ja: パーカー君学校はどうした？ 自由時間です

translation.en: Okay, well, I do not. So make your point quickly.
translation.ja: 私はヒマじゃない　話は早く

translation.en: Fine, there may not be a dinosaur running around.
translation.ja: あれは恐竜じゃないもっと危険です

translation.en: There is something more dangerous, and I know who.
translation.ja: あれは恐竜じゃないもっと危険です 正体を知ってます
正体を？ コナーズ博士

translation.en: ...who's my daughter's mentor. Is that who? -That's the one. -Okay.
translation.ja: 博士は娘の大事な先生だ

translation.en: Recently, Dr. Connors gave Gwen a glowing college recommendation.
translation.ja: 大学への推薦状も書いてくれた

translation.en: It was beautiful. When I read it, I cried.
You would have me believe... ...that he is running around dressed up like a dinosaur?
translation.ja: その博士が 恐竜の着ぐるみで走り回ってると？

translation.en: Not dressing up and not a dinosaur. He has transformed himself into a lizard.
translation.ja: 着ぐるみじゃない大トカゲに変身する

translation.en: Let me ask you a question. Do I look like the mayor of Tokyo to you?
translation.ja: 私がゴジラの街東京の知事に見えるかね

translation.en: I'm telling you the absolute truth.
translation.ja: ウソじゃない　本当です

translation.en: This man has worked for his whole life on cross-species genetics.
translation.ja: 彼は遺伝子交配の研究で失くした腕を戻そうとした

translation.en: He lost an arm, he tried to grow it back, but the equation was imbalanced.
translation.ja: 彼は遺伝子交配の研究で失くした腕を戻そうとした だが なぜだか全身トカゲに変身

translation.en: He has turned into a lizard. He's using lizard DNA.
translation.ja: だが なぜだか全身トカゲに変身 トカゲのＤＮＡは危険です恐ろしいことを考えてる

translation.en: He is dangerous, and he is planning something horrific. I know. I know.
translation.ja: トカゲのＤＮＡは危険です恐ろしいことを考えてる

translation.en: Okay. All right, I get it.
translation.ja: いいだろう　分かった

translation.en: Here's what we'll do. You'll go back to hanging out with the citizens of Tokyo.
translation.ja: 君は戻って 東京の人々の心配をしてろ

translation.en: I'm gonna go back to protecting the citizens of this fine, fair city of ours.
translation.ja: 私は この美しい街の市民を守る仕事に戻る

translation.en: Sergeant Butler, please escort Mr. Parker back to school.
translation.ja: 私は この美しい街の市民を守る仕事に戻る パーカー君を学校に戻してやれ

translation.en: Captain Stacy, I'm not messing around.
translation.ja: デタラメは言ってない

translation.en: Just bring him in. Just call him in. You have to call him in.
translation.ja: 彼を捕まえて 放っておくと危険です

translation.en: He is a danger to everybody.
translation.ja: 放っておくと危険です
お願いだ　聞いてくれ

translation.en: Get me everything we have on Dr. Curtis Connors. -Okay? Right away. -Yeah.
translation.ja: コナーズ博士の情報を集めてくれ　すぐにだ

translation.en: Subject: Dr. Curtis Connors. Current temperature: 89.7.
translation.ja: 被験者 コナーズ博士現在の体温32度

translation.en: Blood panels reveal lymphocyte and monocyte readings... ...consistent with subject's past.
translation.ja: 白血球の測定値は被験者の過去の数値と一致

translation.en: Marked enhancement... ...in muscle response... ...strength and elasticity.
translation.ja: 筋肉反応 強度 弾力性も劇的に増進

translation.en: Eyesight similarly improved. Subject no longer requires corrective lenses.
translation.ja: 視力も同様に改善メガネは必要なくなった

translation.en: This is no longer about curing ills.
translation.ja: もはや病気の治療ではない
完ぺきなる肉体の獲得だ

translation.en: In attempt to redress regenerative relapse...
translation.ja: 変化が元に戻らぬよう―
投薬を200ミリグラムに増量
二度とジャマはさせん
私は日ごとに強くなってる

translation.en: You should maybe... ...consider coming in through the lobby.
translation.ja: たまにはロビーからも来て

translation.en: Also, my father is under the impression... -...that you require psychiatric attention. -Oh, really?
translation.ja: パパが あなたは精神科医の診察が必要だって

translation.en: You should see the other guy.
The other guy, in this instance, being a giant mutant lizard.
translation.ja: 奴は巨大リザードに変異した
グウェン　ココア飲むか

translation.en: Do you want cocoa? Howard's making some.
translation.ja: グウェン　ココア飲むか ハワードが作る

translation.en: No, Dad, I do not want cocoa.
translation.ja: ココアなんて要らない

translation.en: I remembered somebody saying her fantasy was to live in a chocolate house.
translation.ja: 先週はチョコレートの家に住みたいと言ってたろ

translation.en: I can't have cocoa right now because I'm work--
translation.ja: ごめん 今 ココア飲みたくない
今 ココア飲みたくない だって今日 アノ日だし
だって今日 アノ日だし

translation.en: I feel kind of pukey and just sort of.... -Like, emotional. I keep crying. -It's okay. Good.
translation.ja: 吐き気もするし気が高ぶって

translation.en: You don't want to know. -It's, like, bad. -Got it.
Every day, for as long as I can remember...
translation.ja: 物心ついたときから父は―
物心ついたときから父は― 毎朝 胸にバッジをつけて家を出る

translation.en: ...and he's put a badge on his chest...
translation.ja: 毎朝 胸にバッジをつけて家を出る

translation.en: ...and strapped a gun to his hip.
And every day, for as long as I can remember... ...I haven't known if he was gonna make it home.
translation.ja: いつも 無事に帰ってくるか心配してる

translation.en: I gotta stop him, though. I have to, because I created him.
translation.ja: でも彼を止めなければ僕が創り出したんだ

translation.en: Something my father had been working on, you know.
Secretly. Now I realize why he kept it a secret.
translation.ja: 秘密でねその理由が分かった

translation.en: Point is, this is my responsibility.
Let's just get out of here.
Just for a minute. Can we?
Yes. If my parents see me leaving, I'm dead.
translation.ja: 親にバレたら殺されちゃう

translation.en: Your parents aren't gonna see you leaving.
I'm not the one who needs help.
translation.ja: 私は助けなど求めてないぞ

translation.en: There will be no more loneliness... ...no more outcasts.
translation.ja: これからは孤独も疎外もなくなる

translation.en: Species-wide distribution... ...could enhance humanity on an evolutionary scale.
translation.ja: 種々の遺伝子を取り込む事で人間は次の段階へ進化する

translation.en: One has to adapt to survive.
translation.ja: 生存には適合が必要だ

translation.en: "That, changing like the snake, I might be free...
...to cast off flesh wherein I dwell confined."
translation.ja: “私を閉じ込めていた肉体を脱ぎ捨てる”

translation.en: Would you give it all up... ...after all you know you can do?
translation.ja: お前は捨てられるか？自分の力を知った今―

translation.en: You're not gonna get in the way of my plan, Peter Parker!
translation.ja: 私の計画のジャマはさせんぞピーター･パーカー！
逃げられんぞ　ピーター

translation.en: All these souls... ...lost and alone. I can save them. I can cure them.
translation.ja: 救いもなく苦しむ人々を私が救う　治してやる

translation.en: There's no need to stop me, Peter.

translation.ja: 本当のあなたじゃない

translation.en: -I'm gonna throw you out the window. -What?

translation.ja: 警察が来た　悪いトカゲだ

translation.en: This is Lieutenant Williams... ...from the New York City Police Department.
translation.ja: ニューヨーク市警ウィリアムズ警部補だ

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm okay. I'm in the sewer, tracking him.
translation.ja: 心配ない　今 下水道だ

translation.en: I gotta stop him before anyone gets hurt. But we need an antidote.
translation.ja: 博士を止めたいが解毒剤が要る

translation.en: -Do you know how to run a serum? -I do it all the time.
translation.ja: 血清を扱える？ もちろんよ

translation.en: Okay, great. Okay, I need you to go to Oscorp.
translation.ja: オズコープ社へ行ってくれ

translation.en: I need you to access the cross-species file. It's a blue serum.
translation.ja: 血清用のファイルがある

translation.en: Okay, got it. On my way.
translation.ja: 分かった　すぐに行く

translation.en: I spent my life as a scientist trying to create a world without weakness... ...without outcasts.
translation.ja: 私は弱者や疎外される者のない世界を作りたかった

translation.en: I sought to create a stronger human being... ...but there's no such thing.
translation.ja: より強い人間を作りたかったがムリだ

translation.en: Human beings are weak, pathetic, feeble-minded creatures.
translation.ja: 人間は弱くて みじめで情けない生き物だ

translation.en: Why be human at all... ...when we can be so much more?
translation.ja: 強くなれるなら人間である必要はない
より速く より賢くなれるなら

translation.en: This is my gift to you.
translation.ja: これは人間への贈り物だ

translation.en: We have a confirmed sighting, sir. The Lizard's headed toward Canal Street.
translation.ja: 大トカゲはカナル通り駅に向かってます
スパイダーマンは？ 高校かと

translation.en: I want that Spider-Man off the street.
The lizard creature has released a biological agent.
translation.ja: トカゲが生物剤を撒きました

translation.en: All efforts to stop him have failed... ...and he is now proceeding north on 7th Avenue. Over.
translation.ja: 制止は失敗　７番街を北に向かっています
どこだ？ オズコープ社よ

translation.en: You have to get out of there now.

translation.ja: 解毒剤を 博士が そこへ向かってるすぐに着く

translation.en: Connors is on the way. He's coming to you right now.
translation.ja: 博士が そこへ向かってるすぐに着く

translation.en: He needs the device. He's gonna infect the whole city!
translation.ja: “ガナーリ装置”で生物剤を撒く

translation.en: You're gonna wait eight minutes after what I told you?
translation.ja: 分からないのか みんな死ぬ

translation.en: Gwen! Gwen! You Mother Hubbard. Are you serious?
translation.ja: グウェン！ まったく　本気か

translation.en: Stand down now, or we will open fire.
translation.ja: 止まれ　発砲するぞ

translation.en: You are surrounded. There is no escape.
translation.ja: 包囲した　逃げ場はない

translation.en: It's headed to Oscorp! And your daughter's there right now.
translation.ja: 奴がオズコープ社へグウェンがいます

translation.en: Well, Paul, if I didn't see it, I wouldn't believe it.
translation.ja: 見たこともない光景です

translation.en: I won't venture to say what it is crawling up... ...the north side of the Oscorp Tower...
translation.ja: 正体不明のものがタワーの北側を登っています

translation.en: ...but clearly it is not human and it is very, very strong.
translation.ja: 人間ではない　すごい力です

translation.en: We're getting the latest details. This is just coming in.
translation.ja: たった今 情報が入りました

translation.en: The New York Police Department... ...has called for a city-wide evacuation...
translation.ja: 警察は街からの避難を勧告しました

translation.en: If you are south of 54th Street... ...you have to move out of the area immediately.
translation.ja: 54丁目から南の人は至急避難してください

translation.en: Spider-Man appears to be heading towards Oscorp.
translation.ja: スパイダーマンもタワーへ

translation.en: He looks injured... ...and it's really not clear if he's gonna make it.
translation.ja: ケガをしてます無事たどり着けるのか

translation.en: That's the guy who... ...saved my boy on the bridge.
Troy, they're clearing us out. Something bad's going down in Midtown.
translation.ja: 退避勧告だ　何か起こってる

translation.en: Still friends with Matthews, that crane operator on 6th?
translation.ja: ６番街のクレーン操縦士は友達か？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Get him on the phone for me.
Get him on the phone for me.
Hey, Charlie, get me Enriquez on 54th Street!
translation.ja: チャーリーエンリケスに連絡を

translation.en: -You got it. -Angelo, get your mug over here.
translation.ja: アンジェロ　来てくれ
ウォルスキー　残業だ

translation.en: ...swing your jib arms over the avenue. Boom angles at 90 degrees.
translation.ja: アームを道に向けろ角度は90度だ

translation.en: Spider-Man needs those big boys high and lined up.
translation.ja: スパイダーマンのために―

translation.en: Let's give him a clear approach. Over.

translation.ja: これをスパイダーマンに

translation.en: -I have to get this to Spider-Man. -Get in.
translation.ja: これをスパイダーマンに 車に乗るんだ

translation.en: -It can stop the Lizard. -Get in the car.

translation.ja: 違うの 分かってる

translation.en: Your boyfriend is a man of many masks. I get it.
translation.ja: マスクの男はお前の彼氏だった

translation.en: Give me this. Get in the car.

translation.ja: ガナーリ装置 セット
哀れだな　ピーター
大丈夫　阻止しました

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's get you out of here. Come on.
Look at me. Stay with me.
translation.ja: しっかりして　助けが来ます

translation.en: -Help's on the way, okay? -You need to....
translation.ja: しっかりして　助けが来ます 君は…

translation.en: You need to be gone when they get here. Okay?
translation.ja: 人が来る前に 先に消えろいいな

translation.en: I was wrong about you, Peter.

translation.ja: これを　君に必要だ

translation.en: Sometimes the people closest to you.
So I want you to promise me something, okay?

translation.ja: もう グウェンに近づくな

translation.en: An eerie calm has set in over New York City.
translation.ja: 不気味な静寂が街を包んでます

translation.en: Apparently, some sort of aerosolized antidote... ...was launched from Oscorp Tower...
translation.ja: オズコープ･タワーから霧状の解毒剤が散布され―

translation.en: ...which seems to have counteracted the biotoxins.
translation.ja: 生物毒素を中和したようです

translation.en: Residents of Lower Manhattan can rest peacefully...
translation.ja: これでマンハッタンの住民も安心です

translation.en: ...knowing that the alleged mastermind of this terror plot... ...Dr. Curtis Connors, is behind bars.
translation.ja: テロの首謀者コナーズ博士は拘束されました

translation.en: We've got John Niles... ...on the street for a report in Lower Manhattan.
translation.ja: マンハッタンにいるジョンに話を
ピーター　いいのよ
追悼スピーチもあった

translation.en: Two of my teachers showed up.

translation.ja: でも あなたはいなかった

translation.en: Can't do this. Can't do this.
translation.ja: だめだ もうだめだ
すまない　もう… 何なの？

translation.en: He made you promise, didn't he?
translation.ja: パパが約束させたのね

translation.en: To stay away from me, so I'd be safe.
translation.ja: もう 私に近づくなって
おじさんも そう言った

translation.en: I'm just no good for her.
Peter Parker, if there's one thing you are, it's good.
translation.ja: ピーター　あなたはダメな人間じゃない

translation.en: Anyone has a problem with that can talk to me.
translation.ja: 文句ある者は 私が許さない

translation.en: Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
translation.ja: ピーター　最近お前が大変なのは知ってる

translation.en: ...and I'm sorry about that. I think I know what you're feeling.
translation.ja: 辛いだろうお前の気持ちは分かる

translation.en: Ever since you were a little boy...
...you've been living with so many unresolved things.
translation.ja: お前は難しい環境で育ってきた

translation.en: Well, take it from an old man:
Those things send us down a road. They make us who we are.
translation.ja: 困難が人の運命を決めるどんな人間になるかを

translation.en: And if anyone's destined for greatness, it's you, son.
translation.ja: 偉大な人間になるとしたらそれはお前だ

translation.en: You owe the world your gifts.
translation.ja: お前は才能を授かった

translation.en: You just have to figure out how to use them.
translation.ja: それをどう使うかは考えろ

translation.en: And know that wherever they take you... ...we'll always be here.
translation.ja: その結果 何が起きようと私たちはお前の味方だ

translation.en: Dude's crazy. But chicks dig him.
translation.ja: こいつスゲえ女に人気だし

translation.en: I had a professor once who liked to tell his students...
translation.ja: ある教授が こう言ったの

translation.en: ...that there were only 10 different plots in all of fiction.
Well, I'm here to tell you he was wrong.
There is only one: "Who am I"?
translation.ja: ひとつしかない“自分は誰？”
パーカー　また遅刻ね

translation.en: At least we can always count on you.
Sorry, Miss Ritter, won't happen again, I promise.
translation.ja: もう遅れません　約束します

translation.en: Don't make promises you can't keep.
translation.ja: 守れない約束はしないで

translation.en: Yeah, but those are the best kind.
Okay, class, open your books. Let's begin on page one.
translation.ja: では教科書を開いて１ページから始めます

translation.en: Did you tell the boy the truth about his father?
translation.ja: 父親の真実を息子に話したか？
いや それはよかった

translation.en: So we'll let him be for now.
